profiles.label: EYFS (ages 3-5)
profiles.description: Maximum filtering, aggressive mode on, block adult searches and risky domains.

profiles.label: Key Stage 1 (ages 5-7)
profiles.description: High sensitivity with aggressive mode enabled; social media blocked.

profiles.label: Key Stage 2 (ages 7-11)

profiles.label: Key Stage 3 (ages 11-14)

profiles.label: Key Stage 4 & Post-16
profiles.description: Standard sensitivity; aggressive mode optional; overrides still require PIN.
